column3: Ɔno a ɔkyerɛkyerɛ me nsa na nsatseaba akodzi
column7: M’abantsentsen na me gyefo; Me kyɛm
column8: na nyia motwer no; Ɔno a ɔbrɛ me man adze hyɛ m’ase."

column4: na ɔwo edwen no do yi? Anaa ɔdasanyi ne ba
column5: na ɔwo ibu no bi yi?"

column2: "Ɔdasanyi tse dɛ ehuhuw: Ne nda tse dɛ nwinwin a ɔresen."

column3: na pansam hɔn; Totow w’egyen menaba na bɔ hɔn"

column2: "To wo nsa fi sor; Hwim me
column3: na gye me fi esu akɛse mu
Na hɔn abanyimfa yɛ ator abanyimfa."

column4: Nyankopɔn: Medze nsankutsen a no do nhoma du mobɔtow ayɛyindwom ama wo."

column2: "Ɔwo a edze nkwagye ma ahemfo: Na egye w’akowaa David fi afona ndam ndam no ano."

column3: na gye me fi ananaben nsamu
column4: Hɔn a hɔn ano ka nsɛnhun
column5: Na hɔn abanyimfa yɛ ator abanyimfa."

column2: "Ma hɛn mbabanyin hɔn mberantsɛber nyɛ dɛ atsɛndua a woenyin yie; Na hɛn mbabaa nyɛ kutuwdo abo a wɔasen no ahemfie dze no saso;"
"Ma hɛn asan nyeyɛ amaama a ɔma adze horow nyinara; Ma hɛn nguan nwowo mpempem na pedu pedu wɔ hɛn haban mu;"
"Ma hɛn anantwi nya apɔwmudzen; Mma wɔmmpon yafun anaa wɔnnyɛ asaa
column3: Ma osu nkekamu biara mmba hɛn abrɔn mu;"

column2: "Esiarfo nye ɔman a wɔtse dɛm asetsena yi mu: Ampaara esiarfo nye ɔman a EWURADZE yɛ hɔn Nyankopɔn."
